readability_reflection: I found concatenation more readable since I rarely see interpolation actually used.
comprehension_debugging: I found the concatenated snippets to be easier to understand since, as I said, I haven't seen too much in the way of string interpolation before.
preference_rationale: I would prefer to use string concatenation since I find concatenation is often easier to read, easier to understand, and more intuitive.
learning_curve: I had more experience with string concatenation in the past, so I found that string concatenation was easier for me to understand.
suggestions_improvement: I don't really have any specific recommendations that I can think of, but I personally found concatenation to be more readable.
